meanings.sent1: The group of canailles caused chaos in the town square.
meanings.sent2: The canailles were known for their mischief in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The canailles played pranks on unsuspecting passersby.
meanings.sent4: Their behavior at the party was pure canailles.
meanings.sent5: The canailles' antics made them infamous in the village.

meanings.sent1: The cat had a canailles look in its eyes as it knocked over the vase.
meanings.sent2: She had a canailles grin when she pulled off the prank.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy had a canailles streak in him.
meanings.sent4: Her deceitful actions had a canailles charm to them.
meanings.sent5: The canailles behavior of the children was evident in their sly smiles.
